document.full_text: officials shut down a 'maternity tourism' house in california where, they say, chinese women paid tens of thousands of dollars to stay and deliver their babies, making the infants automatic american citizens.
document.title: arriving as pregnant tourists, leaving with american babies
lines_and_colors: officials shut down a 'maternity tourism' house in california where, they say, chinese women paid tens of thousands of dollars to stay and deliver their babies, making the infants automatic american citizens.
